healthTips.message: Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily. Proper hydration improves energy levels, skin health, and overall wellbeing.

healthTips.message: Engage in at least 30 minutes of physical activity daily to improve cardiovascular health and reduce stress.

healthTips.message: Include vegetables, fruits, lean proteins, and whole grains in your meals to maintain steady energy throughout the day.

healthTips.message: Practice mindfulness, deep breathing, or meditation for a few minutes each day to keep stress levels in check.

healthTips.message: Brush twice a day and floss regularly to prevent dental issues and support overall health.

healthTips.title: ğŸ“µ Take Screen Breaks
healthTips.message: Follow the 20-20-20 rule: every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds to reduce eye strain.

healthTips.title: ğŸ Snack Smart
healthTips.message: Choose healthy snacks like fruits, nuts, or yogurt instead of processed foods to maintain focus and energy.

healthTips.title: ğŸ§‚ Limit Excess Salt
healthTips.message: Reducing salt intake helps maintain healthy blood pressure and supports heart health.

healthTips.title: ğŸš° Wash Your Hands
healthTips.message: Wash hands regularly with soap to reduce the spread of germs and prevent illness.

healthTips.title: ğŸ“… Maintain Routine
healthTips.message: Keeping a consistent daily routine can improve productivity, sleep quality, and mental clarity.

healthTips.title: ğŸš­ Avoid Smoking
healthTips.message: Avoiding tobacco significantly lowers the risk of heart disease, lung disease, and cancer.

healthTips.title: ğŸµ Cut Back on Sugary Drinks
healthTips.message: Replace sugary beverages with water or unsweetened tea to reduce unnecessary calorie intake.

healthTips.title: ğŸ¤ Stay Socially Connected
healthTips.message: Regular social interaction supports mental health and reduces feelings of isolation.
